projects.name: Power BI report - Analysis of supermarkets' products prices
projects.description: Power BI report created from data collected using web scraping in Python.

projects.name: Web scraping data using Python
projects.description: Using web scraping techniques, the goal of this project is to collect data from two different supermarkets' websites, analyze changes over time and find the best deals.

projects.name: Article: Using data to nudge people
projects.description: Article entitled “What is the one thing that you keep putting off again and again until tomorrow?” shares how to use simple data to nudge people into avoiding procrastination.

projects.name: Data exploration using SQL
projects.description: This projects shows how to explore a database related to COVID-19 (cases, deaths and vaccination) using SQL.

projects.name: Customer Segmentation Project using K-Means Clustering
projects.description: Jupyter Notebook demonstrating how to segment customers into groups in order to optimize a company's marketing strategy

projects.name: Tableau - Customer Analysis from Marketing Campaigns
projects.description: Using a dataset from Kaggle, this project presents data about customers purchases through different channels and use of discounts from marketing campaigns.

projects.name: Tableau - Airbnb 2016 Listings in Seattle
projects.description: Dashboard that displays data regarding Airbnb 2016 Listings in Seattle.

projects.name: Working with Missing Data in Python
projects.description: Techniques to handle missing data without dropping rows or columns
